languages.text: "Послушайте, {name}. Я приношу свои искренние извинения за это... недоразумение. С Владаймом у нас всякое бывало, но я и не думала, что он захочет обобрать меня до нитки, а затем прикончить в темном углу... так скоро. Если бы вы не согласились на нашу сделку, шерин, висеть бы нам с ребятами сейчас на орбите одного из футфольских астероидов".

"Listen, {name}. I'm genuinely sorry about this... confusion. Vladaym and I have had our difficulties, but I never thought he'd want to clean me out and do away with me in some dark corner... at least, not so soon. If you hadn't agreed to our deal, shereen, my gang and I would already be floating in orbit around one of Footfall's asteroids."
languages.original_text: "Послушайте, {name}. Я приношу свои искренние извинения за это... недоразумение. С Владаймом у нас всякое бывало, но я и не думала, что он захочет обобрать меня до нитки, а затем прикончить в темном углу... так скоро. Если бы вы не согласились на нашу сделку, шерин, висеть бы нам с ребятами сейчас на орбите одного из футфольских астероидов".

If you hadn't agreed to our deal, shereen, my gang and I would already be floating in orbit around one of Footfall's asteroids."

Vladaym and I have had our difficulties, but I never thought he'd want to clean me out and do away with me in some dark corner... at least, not so soon. If you hadn't agreed to our deal, shereen, my gang and I would already be floating in orbit around one of Footfall's asteroids."

"Listen, {name}. I'm genuinely sorry about this... confusion. Vladaym and I have had our difficulties, but I never thought he'd want to clean me out and do away with me in some dark corner... at least, not so soon. If you hadn't agreed to our deal, shereen, my gang and I would already be floating in orbit around one of Footfall's asteroids."

"Listen, {name}. I'm genuinely sorry about this... confusion. Vladaym and I have had our difficulties, but I never thought he'd want to clean me out and do away with me in some dark corner... at least, not so soon. If you hadn't agreed to our deal, shereen, my gang and I would already be floating in orbit around one of Footfall's asteroids."

languages.text: “听着，{name}。对于这样的……意外，我真的很抱歉。我和弗拉迪姆之间确实有过节，但我从没想过，他居然打算直接把我收拾掉……至少我没想到他这么快就动手。要不是因为你答应了我们之间的交易，亲爱的，我和我的伙伴说不定已经在落脚港的小行星轨道上飘着了。”
languages.original_text: "Listen, {name}. I'm genuinely sorry about this... confusion. Vladaym and I have had our difficulties, but I never thought he'd want to clean me out and do away with me in some dark corner... at least, not so soon. If you hadn't agreed to our deal, shereen, my gang and I would already be floating in orbit around one of Footfall's asteroids."

traits.locale_text: “听着，{name}。对于这样的……意外，我真的很抱歉。我和弗拉迪姆之间确实有过节，但我从没想过，他居然打算直接把我收拾掉……至少我没想到他这么快就动手。要不是因为你答应了我们之间的交易，亲爱的，我和我的伙伴说不定已经在落脚港的小行星轨道上飘着了。”

languages.text: «Escuche, {name}. Lamento profundamente todo este... malentendido. Vladaym y yo hemos tenido nuestras diferencias, pero no pensaba que fuera a querer matarme a la primera de cambio... por lo menos, pensaba que todavía no. Si no hubiera aceptado nuestro trato, shereen, mi banda y yo estaríamos orbitando uno de los asteroides de Paso a estas alturas».
languages.original_text: "Listen, {name}. I'm genuinely sorry about this... confusion. Vladaym and I have had our difficulties, but I never thought he'd want to clean me out and do away with me in some dark corner... at least, not so soon. If you hadn't agreed to our deal, shereen, my gang and I would already be floating in orbit around one of Footfall's asteroids."

traits.locale_text: «Escuche, {name}. Lamento profundamente todo este... malentendido. Vladaym y yo hemos tenido nuestras diferencias, pero no pensaba que fuera a querer matarme a la primera de cambio... por lo menos, pensaba que todavía no. Si no hubiera aceptado nuestro trato, shereen, mi banda y yo estaríamos orbitando uno de los asteroides de Paso a estas alturas».

languages.text: 「聞いて、{name}。本当に…混乱させてしまってごめん。ヴラダイムとの間には確執はあったけど、まさか彼があたしを、人目につかない場所で始末しようとするなんて思いもしなかった…少なくとも、こんな早くにはね。アンタが取引に応じてくれな買ったら、あたし達は、フットフォールの小惑星帯に浮かんでいただろうね」
languages.original_text: "Listen, {name}. I'm genuinely sorry about this... confusion. Vladaym and I have had our difficulties, but I never thought he'd want to clean me out and do away with me in some dark corner... at least, not so soon. If you hadn't agreed to our deal, shereen, my gang and I would already be floating in orbit around one of Footfall's asteroids."

traits.locale_text: 「聞いて、{name}。本当に…混乱させてしまってごめん。ヴラダイムとの間には確執はあったけど、まさか彼があたしを、人目につかない場所で始末しようとするなんて思いもしなかった…少なくとも、こんな早くにはね。アンタが取引に応じてくれな買ったら、あたし達は、フットフォールの小惑星帯に浮かんでいただろうね」

languages.text: « Écoutez, {name}. Je suis vraiment désolée pour toute cette... confusion. Vladaym et moi n'avons jamais été les meilleurs amis du monde, mais je n'aurais jamais cru qu'il essaierait de se débarrasser de moi comme ça... Pas déjà, en tout cas. Si vous n'aviez pas accepté ma proposition, shereen, mes associés et moi serions très certainement en train de flotter en orbite autour d'un des astéroïdes de Castel. »
languages.original_text: "Listen, {name}. I'm genuinely sorry about this... confusion. Vladaym and I have had our difficulties, but I never thought he'd want to clean me out and do away with me in some dark corner... at least, not so soon. If you hadn't agreed to our deal, shereen, my gang and I would already be floating in orbit around one of Footfall's asteroids."

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez, {name}. Je suis vraiment désolée pour toute cette... confusion. Vladaym et moi n'avons jamais été les meilleurs amis du monde, mais je n'aurais jamais cru qu'il essaierait de se débarrasser de moi comme ça... Pas déjà, en tout cas. Si vous n'aviez pas accepté ma proposition, shereen, mes associés et moi serions très certainement en train de flotter en orbite autour d'un des astéroïdes de Castel. »

languages.text: "Hört mal, {name}. Diese ganze ... Verwirrung tut mir wirklich leid. Vladaym und ich hatten so unsere Differenzen, aber ich hätte nie gedacht, dass er mich ausrauben und mich in einer dunklen Ecke verschwinden lassen will. Zumindest nicht so früh. Hättet Ihr nicht in unsere Abmachung eingewilligt, Shereen, meine Bande und ich würden bereits im Orbit eines der Asteroiden von Footfall kreisen."
languages.original_text: "Listen, {name}. I'm genuinely sorry about this... confusion. Vladaym and I have had our difficulties, but I never thought he'd want to clean me out and do away with me in some dark corner... at least, not so soon. If you hadn't agreed to our deal, shereen, my gang and I would already be floating in orbit around one of Footfall's asteroids."

traits.locale_text: "Hört mal, {name}. Diese ganze ... Verwirrung tut mir wirklich leid. Vladaym und ich hatten so unsere Differenzen, aber ich hätte nie gedacht, dass er mich ausrauben und mich in einer dunklen Ecke verschwinden lassen will. Zumindest nicht so früh. Hättet Ihr nicht in unsere Abmachung eingewilligt, Shereen, meine Bande und ich würden bereits im Orbit eines der Asteroiden von Footfall kreisen."

languages.text: "Dinle {name}. Bu karışıklık için gerçekten özür dilerim. Vladaym ile çeşitli münakaşalar yaşadık tabii ama beni soğana çevirip kuytu bir köşede işimi bitirmek isteyeceğini hiç düşünmemiştim. Henüz yeltenmez diyordum... Anlaşmamızı kabul etmeseydin çetemle Binliman asteroitlerinden birinin yörüngesinde savruluyor olurduk şirinim."
languages.original_text: "Listen, {name}. I'm genuinely sorry about this... confusion. Vladaym and I have had our difficulties, but I never thought he'd want to clean me out and do away with me in some dark corner... at least, not so soon. If you hadn't agreed to our deal, shereen, my gang and I would already be floating in orbit around one of Footfall's asteroids."

traits.locale_text: "Dinle {name}. Bu karışıklık için gerçekten üzgünüm. Vladaym ile çeşitli münakaşalar yaşadık tabii ama beni soğana çevirip kuytu bir köşede işimi bitirmek isteyeceğini hiç düşünmemiştim. En azından şimdilik... Anlaşmamızı kabul etmeseydin, çetem ile çoktan Binliman asteroitlerinden birinin yörüngesinde dolanıyor olurduk şirinim."
